t: 4:1*r The Hebrew word for guardian-redeemer*i is a legal term for one who has the obligation to redeem a relative in serious difficulty (see Lev. 25:25-55); also in verses 3, 6, 8 and 14.
4:4*r Many Hebrew manuscripts, Septuagint, Vulgate and Syriac; most Hebrew manuscripts he*i
4:5*r Vulgate and Syriac; Hebrew (see also Septuagint) Naomi*i and*i from*i Ruth*i the*i Moabite,*i you*i acquire*i the*i
4:20*r A few Hebrew manuscripts, some Septuagint manuscripts and Vulgate (see also verse 21 and Septuagint of 1 Chron. 2:11); most Hebrew manuscripts Salma*i
